product.title: Rimini Jade - Roller Blind
product.description: If fresh and immaculate is the look you're going for, then look no further than the pretty pastel of the rimini roller-blind in jade. It adds a splash of colour without taking over the room or creating too intense a look, and allows just a slip of light to penetrate through. Team this beauty with pastel pinks, colourful florals, and neutral beiges and creams to provide a subtle accent to its complementary hues.

relproducts.title: Rimini Storm Cloud - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini's storm cloud is moody, broody, and full of atmosphere, just as its name might suggest. That said, it's still light enough that it won't black out your room when closed, with some light still able to peer through. Settle the storm cloud amongst paler greys and whites for a modern, monochrome living room, or pair with brick reds, bright oranges, or pale yellows for a cool retro bedroom.

relproducts.title: Rimini Sand - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Rimini sand's pale yellow-cream hue is a pretty, uplifting addition to any window. Its light translucency means that plenty of light penetrates it, even when closed, so you'll never be lacking in sunshine. Pair sand with navy blues and light-coloured woods for a modern look with a unique twist, or with browns, greens, and golds for something classic and luxurious. Either of these would be the perfect look for the living room or dining room in a contemporary, stylish home.

relproducts.title: Rimini Azure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it. It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

relproducts.title: Rimini Turquoise - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

relproducts.title: Rimini Coffee - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Think luxurious, rich, creamy cappuccino, and you've got the feel of the rimini in coffee. This is the perfect neutral shade - soft enough to fit well amongst other, richer shades, yet distinct enough to work as a colour all by itself. Nestle amongst rich browns, pale creams, and vintage golds to really make the most of this subtle hue, which makes a beautiful, sophisticated accent for a bedroom or living room window.

relproducts.title: Rimini Chocolate - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: You'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate brings to mind. Pair up with creams, golds, and beiges for a classic yet contemporary finish. This is the perfect shade for a tranquil living room; a snug, homely bedroom; or a warm, swish home office.

relproducts.title: Rimini Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

relproducts.title: Rimini Tangerine - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Add some summer cheer to any room with the rimini in tangerine. This fruity shade is fun, fresh, and just a little bit retro. And it's such a bright, sunny colour that it will make a great substitute for the sunshine when it's pulled down. Co-ordinate with rich browns and clean whites for a great, unique look in a living room, or pair with other brights, such as limes and yellows, in a kids' bedroom or playroom to create a fun and playful atmosphere.

relproducts.title: Rimini Ocean - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini's ocean is a deep, intriguing indigo blue, with a mysterious midnight feel to the hue. Its dark shade will certainly keep most of the light out, whilst offering privacy when needed, too. The durability of this no-fuss blind is perfect for a window covering that could get a lot of use. Mix the ocean with pale, icy blues; bright, stark whites; and light, neutral greys. Or, for a striking look, pair with a bright poppy red or a pretty, sunshine yellow.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mid Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with smooth control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. Product id: db-prbx0082 fabric colour: snow material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes stockholm snow white roller blind in white.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Valencia Spring Green Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Fresh and fruity, this valencia spring green roller blind will give your home a bright burst of colour. Combine this blind with more earthy tones to give your room a bold and funky accent or use it to create a vibrant and vivid interior with other striking colours.

relproducts.title: Valencia Sangria Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The valencia sangria roller blind is warm red in colour. Clearly this blind has a vibrant tone but its also a sophisticated choice that will add richness to a scheme. This juicy colour will be a wonderful accent to a room of soft browns and neutral or maybe lighter whites or the valencia sangria roller blind is warm red in colour.

relproducts.title: Valencia Orange Embers Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Choose their striking orange roller blind to add a stunning splash of colour. Its as bright as bright can be. This blind will add a funky zing to any interior; think family rooms, breakfast rooms, rooms featuring strong blocks of colour as well as childrens bedrooms.
